v8:item.v8:content: Monitor application state, back up and restore data, and optimize application performance

Scheduled and background jobs data processor
Create and set up scheduled jobs.
Scheduled online activities such as data synchronization and emailing are disabled to prevent conflicts with the main infobase.
Open totals and aggregates data processor
Set calculated totals period. Rebuild, populate, and optimize aggregates.
<link setting>Backup</> export to 1C Company cloud is enabled.

Edit attributes and tables of selected items.
